investment_info.USDC:
Your tokens will be distributed in several decentralized protocols. You will earn interest in USDC. 
 USDC is a stable cryptocurrency.  Its value is tied to the US dollar, and it is 100% backed by US dollars.
investment_info.DAI:
Your tokens will be distributed in several decentralized protocols.You will earn interest in DAI. 
 DAI is a stable cryptocurrency, its value is tied to the dollar.  It is 100% backed by crypto protocols.
investment_info.WBTC: Your tokens will be distributed in various decentralized protocols. You will earn continuous interest in WBTC. No investment limits.

interactive_tutorial.t2: Do you have an account in Binance?
interactive_tutorial.t3: Do you know how to transfer your Cryptos to Binance?
interactive_tutorial.no_cryptos_text: The process will take a while, return to the creation of the fund when you are ready!

binance_address_tutorial_modal.t1: Where to find the address to deposit your cryptocurrencies
binance_address_tutorial_modal.p1: Within your Binance account, click on âFundsâ, you will find it in the menu that is in the upper right margin.
binance_address_tutorial_modal.p2: In the Funds menu, click on âDepositsâ
binance_address_tutorial_modal.p3: In the selector click and write the name of the cryptomoney that you want to know the address (for practical purposes we will look for BTC). In the list that displays click on the name
binance_address_tutorial_modal.p4: Binance will show you a detail of the status of your BTC account, in the field âBTC Deposit Addressâ, you will find the address. Click on Copy Address and go to your Bitex account and paste the address.
binance_address_tutorial_modal.p5: Keep in mind that this information is important, do not divulge it.

binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.t1: Create APIkey and SECRETkey in Binance
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p1: Letâs get your APIkey and SECRETkey. First, once logged into your account, you must search for âAPI, Creating an API private key provides access to markets and real-time trading services on Binance via a third-party site or application.â and click on API Setting.
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p2: You must enter a password before generating your APIkey. This password can be a combination of numbers and characters, the one you like the most, and then click on âCreate new passwordâ.
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p3: Have your phone near you, Binance will ask for a Google two factor authentication code. Enter the code you get on your phone and then click on âSendâ.
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p4: Binance will send you an email to the email you registered with. If you donât see it on your inbox, remember to check the spam folder. Open the email and click on the link they sent you.
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p5: Now that your APIkay and SECRETkey are created, save your Secret Key because you wonât see it again. Click on close.
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p6: All is left to do is to copy and paste the API Key and Secret Key wherever you want to.
binance_apikey_tutorial_modal.p7: Remember that this is a valuable information and itâs important that you keep it safe, do not send it to third parties that you donât trust.

binance_check_tutorial_modal.t1: How to verify your Identity in Binance and increase the level of the account to Lv.2
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p1: Open your favorite browser and go to
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p2: Click on sign in, you'll find it in the upper right margin
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p3: Note: if you have trouble loading the data in the form, enter Binance from another browser such as Edge, Chrome or FireFox.
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p4: Once youâve signed in, click on Lv.
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p5: Click on Personal to verify you as a person.
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p6: Youâll start the verification, click on continue.
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p7: Choose your country of origin and the type of documentation that you are going to validate, it can be your ID, Passport or Driver's License and select on the icon
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p8: You will continue with the Verification by entering the images of your ID, choose how to upload the images of your ID, in this case we will upload the files from the device
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p9: Choose the image that has the front of the DNI and click on Confirm
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p10: Then you must load the image that contains the back of your ID and click on Confirm
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p11: Finally you must upload an image of yourself holding a sheet with the handwriting inscription âBinance - Date Todayâ and click on Confirm
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p13: When Binance finishes loading the files it will inform you with the following message
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p14: Now you just have to wait for the Binance team to verify your identity and raise the level of your account to Lv.2.
binance_check_tutorial_modal.p15: In case of any error or missing information, Binance will contact you through the e-mail with which you registered. Stay tuned to this medium.

binance_transfer_tutorial_modal.p1: You already have your Bitcoins, so you can now transfer them to Binance so that WCS Advisor can operate.
binance_transfer_tutorial_modal.p2: Within your Bitex account, go to Balances and click Download BTC
binance_transfer_tutorial_modal.p3: Bitex will ask you to enter the address of BTC to which you want to send your BTC, this address is the one that Binance provides you in its platform.
binance_transfer_tutorial_modal.p4: Note: see where to find the address to deposit your BTC in Binance
binance_transfer_tutorial_modal.p5: You must also enter the amount of BTC you want to send and the Google Authentication code and click on Offload
binance_transfer_tutorial_modal.p6: Keep in mind that BTC's shipping operations are carried out from Monday to Friday from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. BTC shipments are subject to network conditions

binance_tutorial_modal.t1: How to create a Binance account
binance_tutorial_modal.p1: Open your favorite browser and go to
binance_tutorial_modal.p2: Click on Register, that your can find in the upper right side of the screen
binance_tutorial_modal.p3: Then you must enter the e-mail with which you want to create your account in Binance, provide a password (it must be at least 6 characters, composed of numbers and letters with at least one uppercase) and confirm the password.
binance_tutorial_modal.p4: In the âReferential ID (optional)â  field you will find the following ID: 36552775, do not change it. If it is empty, enter it.
binance_tutorial_modal.p5: Click on check-box to accept the Binance terms of use and click Register.
binance_tutorial_modal.p6: Note: if you have trouble loading the data in the form, enter Binance from another browser such as Edge, Chrome or FireFox.
binance_tutorial_modal.p7: Binance will send you an email to the email you registered with to confirm it and activate the account.
binance_tutorial_modal.p8: If you can not find it in your inbox, check the Spam folder. Click on the link of the email you received and continue to activate your account.
binance_tutorial_modal.p9: The link will send you to the next page where you must position the puzzle in the right place and prove that you are not a robot.
binance_tutorial_modal.p10: Once you have positioned the puzzle, you have activated your account.
binance_tutorial_modal.p11: When you have the active account, Binance will provide security suggestions for your account, we recommend you check all the options and click continue
binance_tutorial_modal.p12: Binance recommends activating the google two factor authentication. Download the app from playStore, search it as: Google Authentication.
binance_tutorial_modal.p13: Once app is downloaded, click on Next Step and follow the steps.
binance_tutorial_modal.p14: From the app, scan the QR code and click on Next Step
binance_tutorial_modal.p15: Save your password in a paper, and then click on Next Step
binance_tutorial_modal.p16: To end the authentication, enter the access password and the verification code proposed by Authentication Google.
binance_tutorial_modal.p17: If everything is okay, Binance will let you know with the next message, if not, contact Binance for a solution.
binance_tutorial_modal.p18: So far you have created an account in Binance, which in principle does not need to verify your identity to operate, which you can only withdraw up to 2 BTC (Bitcoins) every 24 hours.
binance_tutorial_modal.p19: In case you want to increase the withdrawal limit to 100 BTC for every 24hs, then yes, you must do the verification by clicking on Lv.2 and start with the verification steps. See how to verify your account

ca_tutorial_modal.p1: In order to acquire cryptocurrencies you need a simple and professional platform in which users, regardless of the level of knowledge they have, can after registration, transfer money, buy and sell Bitcoins.
ca_tutorial_modal.p2: We introduce Bitex, since its inception developed business as well as bitcoin exchange market, bitcoin payment gateway and more recently an international corporate remittance service that allows companies to make international payments through local bank transfer, taking advantage of bitcoin technology and allowing companies to make multiple simultaneous payments.
ca_tutorial_modal.p3: We will help you register and activate your account so you can transfer fiduciary money to your Bitex account so that you can obtain your cryptocurrencies.
ca_tutorial_modal.t2: How to create a Bitex Account
ca_tutorial_modal.p4: Open your favorite browser and go to
ca_tutorial_modal.p6: Complete the fields with your email, password, (it must be at least 6 characters, composed of numbers and letters with at least one uppercase), confirm the password and click the checkbox where it says that you are not a US citizen or Dutch and click Register.
ca_tutorial_modal.p7: Note: if you have problems with loading the data in the form, enter bitex from another browser, such as Edge, Chrome or FireFox.
ca_tutorial_modal.p8: You will receive an email from Bitex to confirm the email with which you registered. If you can not find it in your inbox, check the spam folder. Click on the link in the email you received and continue verifying the account.
ca_tutorial_modal.p9: Indicate that you are an individual, not a company.
ca_tutorial_modal.p10: Consider the Bitex requirements to operate locally
ca_tutorial_modal.ul1li1: Valid ID (in color and fully legible)
ca_tutorial_modal.ul1li2: Support of income and savings (last 3 salary receipts or invoices issued in the last month or Declared Jurisdictions of personal assets or profits).
ca_tutorial_modal.p11: Now we will continue with the account verification, remember that all the fields are required, there are four steps:
ca_tutorial_modal.p12: Letâs start with the first step, complete your personal data.
ca_tutorial_modal.p13: There are several fields, here you must upload an image of your ID in front and one on the back, keep in mind that the images have to be clear, in color and not have cuts or areas that can not be read.
ca_tutorial_modal.p14: In step two, you will complete the contact information
ca_tutorial_modal.p15: Here you must upload a phone bill, prepaid or any other service to your name with your current address and click next
ca_tutorial_modal.p16: As a third step, Bitex needs to verify where the money comes from, to do this complete the fields and you must provide a scan or an image such as the receipt of wages, invoices, contracts, liquidation of investments or affidavits of personal assets. Choose the file and click on next.
ca_tutorial_modal.p17: Last step is to wait for account validation, it may take up to 4 days.
ca_tutorial_modal.p18: In case of any error or missing information, Bitex will contact you through the email with which you registered. Stay tuned to this medium.
ca_tutorial_modal.p19: When the account is approved you can make transfers in pesos or dollars to your account to buy BTC (Bitcoins)
ca_tutorial_modal.p20: If you have any doubt, please contact us.
ca_tutorial_modal.t3: How to transfer money to your Bitex Account
ca_tutorial_modal.p21: In order to acquire Bitcoins, the first thing you must do is transfer fiduciary money to your Bitex account.
ca_tutorial_modal.p22: Open your favorite browser and go to
ca_tutorial_modal.p24: Note: if you have problems with loading the data in the form, enter bitex from another browser, such as Edge, Chrome or FireFox.
ca_tutorial_modal.p25: Once in your account click on deposit funds in my account
ca_tutorial_modal.p26: Click on load USD or ARG
ca_tutorial_modal.p27: Bitex will provide you with the information so you can make the transfer from your homebanking, depending on your country of origin and the currency you have chosen
ca_tutorial_modal.p28: From your homebanking do the transfer to be credited to your bitex account, you will receive an email from your bank with the transfer notice.
ca_tutorial_modal.p29: You will also receive an email from Bitex, informing you that the transfer is in process, remember that this may take up to 72 hours. If after 72 business hours have not yet credited your deposit, contact Bitex.
ca_tutorial_modal.p30: Once the balance is credited to your account, Bitex will send you an email informing you that the balance has been charged to your account.
ca_tutorial_modal.p31: Bitex will send you one last email with the invoice, terms and conditions and the detail of the operation
ca_tutorial_modal.p32: If you have any doubt, please contact us.
ca_tutorial_modal.t4: How to Buy Bitcoins in Bitex
ca_tutorial_modal.p33: Once the balance is credited to your bitex account, you can buy your Bitcoins at the best market price
ca_tutorial_modal.p34: To do this go to your bitex account and click on âExchangeâ
ca_tutorial_modal.p35: Within the exchange you will see the balance of your account, in the fiduciary currency that you have chosen (we will assume that you transferred USD), click on buy BTC
ca_tutorial_modal.p36: Then you must enter the amount of USD you want to sell and the price you are going to pay to buy your BTC.
ca_tutorial_modal.p37: Note: If you have dollars in your account we recommend you click on the best price. In case you have entered Argentine pesos, take the orders that are on the ask list.
ca_tutorial_modal.p38: You will receive an email with the status of the transaction in process. When you have the BTC in your account, Bitex will contact you.

extract_tutorial_modal.t1: Â¿Como pasar los fondos que opera WCS a BTC?
extract_tutorial_modal.p1: Para que puedas pasar el total de la cartera que opera WCS de tu cuenta de Binance a BTC debes seleccionar el fondo:
extract_tutorial_modal.p3: Ahora debes seleccionar BTC y presionar Cambiar
extract_tutorial_modal.p5: y listo, comprueba en tu cuenta de Binance que el balance estÃ¡ en la crypto que seleccionaste.
extract_tutorial_modal.t2: Transferir tus BTC de Binance a Bitex
extract_tutorial_modal.p6: Abre tu navegador favorito e ingresa a:
extract_tutorial_modal.p8: Nota: si tiene inconvenientes con la carga de los datos en el formulario ingresa a Bitex con otro navegador como Edge, Chrome o FireFox.
extract_tutorial_modal.p10: Ingresa los datos de autenticaciÃ³n de google
extract_tutorial_modal.p11: Una vez en tu cuenta haz clic sobre el icono de saldos.
extract_tutorial_modal.p13: Bitex mostrarÃ¡ tu direcciÃ³n de BTC para que transfieras tus BTC que tienes en Binance. Copia o scanea el codigo QR.
extract_tutorial_modal.p14: Abre tu navegador favorito e ingresa a:
extract_tutorial_modal.p15: Ingresa a tu cuenta y haz clic en monedo (lo encontrarÃ¡s en el margen superior derecho), en la lista que se despliega haz clic en retirar
extract_tutorial_modal.p16: En donde dice âDirecciÃ³n BTC del destinatarioâ, pega tu direcciÃ³n de BTC de Bitex y luego ingresa la cantidad que quieres transferir. Haz clic en envia
extract_tutorial_modal.p17: Binance te pedirÃ¡ que ingreses el cÃ³digo de autenticaciÃ³n de google
extract_tutorial_modal.p18: Luego te enviarÃ¡ un e-mail para que confirmes el retiro.
extract_tutorial_modal.p19: Ve a tu cuenta de e-mail y haz clic en âConfirm withdrawalâ
extract_tutorial_modal.p20: Se abrirÃ¡ una pantalla donde te informarÃ¡ si todo saliÃ³ bien.
extract_tutorial_modal.p21: Nota: Ten en cuenta que esta transacciÃ³n puede demorar unas horas.
extract_tutorial_modal.p22: Ingresa a tu navegador favorito e ingresa a:
extract_tutorial_modal.p23: Haz clic en ingresar tus datos
extract_tutorial_modal.p24: Ingresa el cÃ³digo de google autenticaciÃ³n
extract_tutorial_modal.p25: Una vez dentro de tu cuenta, haz clic en Exchange
extract_tutorial_modal.p26: Haz clic en vender para vender los BTC que tienes en tu cuenta y recibir USD
extract_tutorial_modal.p27: Ingresa la cantidad de BTC que quieres vender y el precio. Bitex recomienda ingresar el Mejor precio (puedes hacer clic en donde dice âUsar este precioâ) y haz clic en vender.
extract_tutorial_modal.p28: Nota: Esta operaciÃ³n puede demorar unas horas. Recuerda que bitex opera de lunes a viernes de 9 a 17 hs.
extract_tutorial_modal.t5: Transferir USD a tu cuenta Bancaria
extract_tutorial_modal.p29: Ingresa a tu navegador favorito e ingresa a:
extract_tutorial_modal.p30: Haz clic en ingresar y completa tus datos
extract_tutorial_modal.p31: Ingresa el cÃ³digo de autenticaciÃ³n de google
extract_tutorial_modal.p32: Una vez que estÃ©s dentro de tu cuenta, haz clic en saldos
extract_tutorial_modal.p34: Selecciona dÃ³nde deseas recibir el dinero, haciendo clic sobre âtengo nuevas instruccionesâ
extract_tutorial_modal.p35: Selecciona el paÃ­s de tu cuenta bancaria
extract_tutorial_modal.p37: Luego completa todos los campos del formulario que se despliega
extract_tutorial_modal.p38: Por Ãºltimo haz clic en Descargar y bitex se comunicarÃ¡
extract_tutorial_modal.p39: Nota: Recuerda que solo podemos realizar transferencias a cuentas que te pertenezcan a tÃ­, no puedes realizar una extracciÃ³n de bitex a una cuenta de terceros. Las extracciones se procesan de lunes a viernes en horario hÃ¡bil. Los tipos de cambio de dÃ³lares a moneda local estÃ¡n sujetos a variaciones, para mitigarlas recomendamos solicitar tu retiro dentro de nuestros horarios de atenciÃ³n.
extract_tutorial_modal.p40: Una vez iniciada la transferencia suele llegar a destino dentro de las 48 horas hÃ¡biles, aunque puede tardar hasta 5 dÃ­as. El costo de descargar saldo desde Bitex es de 0.5% y no incluye otros costos extra o impuestos que pudieran aplicar a tu retiro. Todos los costos asociados corren a tu cargo.

financial_freedom.title: Towards your financial freedom!
financial_freedom.subtitle: We want you to learn how to get the most for your money in a quick, clear and simple way.

item_1.title: Complete all modules
item_1.description: In order to learn about financial freedom we divide the topics into several modules so be sure to read them all.

item_2.title: Passes tests without errors
item_2.description: You must pass all the tests without errors, you can repeat it as many times as you need.

item_3.title: Wait for your NFT
item_3.description: At the end of all the modules, you will get a free NFT as a prize.

home.title: What would you like to learn today?

global_progress.card_state_0: You haven't completed any module yet, shall we start?
global_progress.card_state_25: You have {{doneModules}} complete modules, don't stop.
global_progress.card_state_50: You have {{doneModules}} complete modules, you are almost there.
global_progress.card_state_75: You have {{doneModules}} complete modules, last effort.
global_progress.card_state_100: Congratulations! You have completed all the modules.

sub_module_1.title: How to get started in finance?
sub_module_1.description: Personal finance is the management of a person's money for saving, spending and budgeting over time. Taking into account risks and/or future events.

sub_module_2.title: Budget
sub_module_2.description: It is a tool that allows you to plan and control your finances, taking into account income and expenses. So you can get a better return on your money.

sub_module_1.title: What is blockchain?
sub_module_1.description: All cryptocurrencies work thanks to the technology called blockchain. In Spanish it means blockchain, and to understand it in a simple way, blockchain is a decentralized database. Like a giant excel spreadsheet where we can all upload data.

share_education.title: One wallet, all opportunities
share_education.text: Education is the foundation of finance and crypto
share_education.share_error: Text was copied to the clipboard

rule_1.title: How do I get my NFT?
rule_1.subtitle: Terms and Conditions

error_test.textSecondary: Remember that you need to respond satisfactorily to all instances.

success_submodule.textSecondary: Que nada te detenga, estÃ¡s cada vez mÃ¡s cerca de convertirte en un experto.

final_success_test.textPrimary: You did it, that's the way to do it!
final_success_test.textSecondary: You have completed all financial education and crypto modules. Your NFT will be credited to your wallet soon.

error_no_wallet.textPrimary: Stop! You don't have your wallet yet
error_no_wallet.textSecondary: To progress through the module, you need to create your wallet so you can claim your prize at the end of the module.

planner_information.title: Organize your finances and meet your goals
planner_information.item_1: Define your monthly expenses and income

objetive_info.title: Objective
objetive_info.paragraph_1: Define what you want to achieve with your money. It can be a trip, buy a car, invest, others.
objetive_info.paragraph_2: Calculate how much money you need in total to reach your goal.

new_objetive.title: Income and expenses*
new_objetive.description_income: Add up all the money you receive during the month: payments, salary, gifts, returns.
new_objetive.description_expenses: Add up all the money you spend in the month: purchases, utility payments, fees, rent.
new_objetive.disclaimer: *This data is private, and will not be used outside of this simulation.
new_objetive.label: USD
new_objetive.toast_text: To move forward with your objetive, your income should exceed your expenses.
new_objetive.success_subtitle: You have enough money to meet your goal.

result_objetive.saving_description: Depending on your monthly income and expenses, you could save {{saving}} USD per month. You would reach your objetive in {{weeks}} weeks.
result_objetive.invest_description: If you invest monthly in DeFi, you will earn returns. Thus, you would achieve your objetive in:
result_objetive.disclaimer: *These results are a simulation only, and may vary from day to day. They do not include compound interest, and are not financial advice.
result_objetive.informative_modal: This goal may take longer than expected. If you wish, you can start with a smaller one.

information.title: Cryptos for a good cause!
information.item_1: Discover new causes where you can collaborate with your donation.
information.item_2: Choose by category, and become an agent of change.

unhcr.title_1: Donate to provide assistance to the affected populations in Ukraine and in the countries of the region.
unhcr.description: It seeks to ensure that refugees have access to: protection from harm, shelter, food, water, blankets, medical supplies, the ability to go to school and, most importantly, hope for a future.

water.title_1: Donate to help train vulnerable people on water care, and provide access to microloans for water and sanitation solutions at home.
water.description: The water crisis negatively impacts the health and livelihoods of more than one-third of the world's population. Water.org aims to transform this reality by working to bring water and sanitation to the world.

rainforest_rescue.title_1: Donate to protect and restore the world's longest-lived rainforest, the Daintree.
rainforest_rescue.description: Its projects seek to raise awareness and conserve the biodiversity and cultural heritage of the rainforest through planting, maintenance and restoration programs.

free_the_girls.title_1: Its projects seek to raise awareness and conserve the biodiversity and cultural heritage of the rainforest through planting, maintenance and restoration programs.
free_the_girls.title_3: Learn more about Free the Girls
free_the_girls.description: It helps these women become entrepreneurs by providing them with the tools to market in local second-hand clothing markets in their communities.

proof_of_integrity.title_1: To provide, through financial education, the necessary tools so that people struggling to meet their basic needs have access to the crypto ecosystem and can use these tools to their advantage.
proof_of_integrity.description: Offer a cryptofinance education program and fund the transaction fees and deposits required to join the Proof of Humanity platform.

send_donations.label: Amount to donate

referrals_info.info_title4: How i see how many referrals i have?
referrals_info.info_description1: Any user can invite other people to visit Xcapit, they just need to create an account and share their link within their referral panel.
referrals_info.info_description2: You will earn $ 10 (ten dollars) for each guest who activates an Advanced or Expert account, and you will earn $ 1 (one dollar) for each guest who activates an Explorer account. In either case, your guest must have an active account for more than 60 days.
referrals_info.info_description3: Within the app, in your referral panel, click Request a reward. We will contact you to coordinate the payment.
referrals_info.info_description4: Within the app in your referral panel you will see the list of active guests and a counter of the money you have earned.

referrals_coming.title: We are creating magic
referrals_coming.paragraph: This program is now closed. We will be resuming soon with new proposals and more benefits.

referrals_tos.title: Bases y condiciones programa de referidos
referrals_tos.paragraph: Crypyolab s.a.s (en adelante, la âEmpresaâ o âXcapitâ) lanza el programa de referidos (en adelante, el âPrograma de referidosâ), cuyo alcance y requisitos estÃ¡ sujeto a las siguientes bases y condiciones (en adelante las âBases"). Estas bases forman parte de los tÃ©rminos y condiciones generales de la plataforma, disponibles en https://app.xcapit.com/support/wallet-info, que son obligatorios y de carÃ¡cter vinculante y el participante declara conocer y aceptar. En caso de eventuales discrepancias o conflictos entre ambos documentos, prevalecerÃ¡n los tÃ©rminos y condiciones generales.
referrals_tos.subtitle_1: 1. Requisitos para participar en el programa de referidos
referrals_tos.paragraph_1: Los usuarios participantes del programa de referidos deberÃ¡n ser (i) Personas fÃ­sicas; (ii) Mayores de 18 aÃ±os.
referrals_tos.paragraph_2: Todos los tÃ©rminos relacionados a la ejecuciÃ³n del programa de referidos estÃ¡n exclusivamente a cargo de la empresa, quien serÃ¡ el Ãºnico responsable de la mecÃ¡nica, control, pruebas, etc. de todo el proceso descrito en las bases. En caso de que la empresa detecte o considere que un referente, en el marco del programa de referidos, cometiÃ³ o comete actos fraudulentos en detrimento de la empresa y/o terceros, la empresa se reserva el derecho de cerrar inmediatamente la cuenta de dicho referente. El email asociado al referente mencionado permanecerÃ¡ bloqueado, por lo que no podrÃ¡ crearse una cuenta con dicha direcciÃ³n de email. La informaciÃ³n asociada a ese email permanecerÃ¡ almacenada segÃºn lo establecido en la polÃ­tica de privacidad, disponible en https://www.xcapit.com/terminos.
referrals_tos.paragraph_3: El programa de referidos tendrÃ¡ una vigencia desde el 12 de noviembre de 2021 y finaliza el dÃ­a 31 de diciembre de 2021.
referrals_tos.subtitle_4: 4. Procedimiento para participar del programa de referidos
referrals_tos.paragraph_4:
4.a. El referente deberÃ¡ descargar la app de Xcapit, registrarse con un mail, validar la cuenta y crear su wallet. al momento de crear la misma, el referente tendrÃ¡ la opciÃ³n de âcopiarâ el link para referir. (el âlinkâ).
4.b. El referente podrÃ¡ enviar el link: a travÃ©s de whatsapp, correo electrÃ³nico, twitter, facebook, linkedin y cualquier otro canal que este considere.
4.c. A medida que mÃ¡s y mÃ¡s contactos referidos se descarguen la app de Xcapit y creen  la wallet, podrÃ¡ ganar recompensas mÃ¡s emocionantes. Para constituir una referencia vÃ¡lida, sus contactos deben: 1) Registrarse en los servicios de la empresa con una direcciÃ³n de correo electrÃ³nico vÃ¡lida y crear la wallet de xcapit, durante el perÃ­odo del concurso; cada recomendaciÃ³n vÃ¡lida que ud. haga le harÃ¡ sumar 1 punto.
4.d. No hay lÃ­mite para la cantidad de referencias que puede hacer por dÃ­a durante el perÃ­odo del concurso.
4.e.Al referente se le asignarÃ¡, un punto por cada referido que, a travÃ©s del link del referente,descargue la app y cree la wallet de xcapit. el punto obtenido por cada referido que se registre no es transferible de ningÃºn modo, ni por ningÃºn motivo, ni negociable, y corresponde Ãºnicamente al email del referente que cumpliÃ³ con el procedimiento establecido en la presente clÃ¡usula 4.
referrals_tos.paragraph_5: Los referidos pueden ser:  (i) Primarios: son aquellos referidos directos, es decir, que se registraron en la app. y crearon la wallet de xcapit con el link que el referente envÃ­o. por cada referido primario, ud. sumarÃ¡ 1 punto. (ii) Secundarios: Son aquellos que se registraron en la app. y crearon la wallet de xcapit, utilizando el link de sus referidos primarios. Por cada referido secundario, ud. sumarÃ¡ 0,5 puntos.
referrals_tos.paragraph_6: Esta secciÃ³n solo se aplica a las partes recomendadas que califican para una recompensa. La empresa notificarÃ¡ a los referentes la cantidad de puntos obtenidos a travÃ©s de pantalla de referidos que podrÃ¡n visualizar desde la app. Cada punto equivale a 1 usd, y la misma se pagarÃ¡ en Matic. Dicha recompensa se podrÃ¡ reclamar a partir de la fecha de finalizaciÃ³n del programa de referidos (clÃ¡usula nÂº 3). Recibir una recompensa de cualquier tipo depende del cumplimiento de todos los requisitos y el cumplimiento de estas reglas. En el caso de que un destinatario de la recompensa sea descalificado por cualquier motivo, la empresa no estÃ¡ obligada a proporcionar una recompensa alternativa ni a extender el perÃ­odo del concurso de ninguna manera.
referrals_tos.paragraph_7: Como condiciÃ³n para participar en el programa de referidos, cada referente acepta que la empresa no serÃ¡ responsable por ningÃºn daÃ±o directo ni indirecto que pudiere sufrir el referente y/o el referido y/o cualquier tercero con motivo y/u ocasiÃ³n de la participaciÃ³n en el programa de referidos, y/o el uso, destino o finalidad del beneficio, renunciando la empresa a cualquier tipo de responsabilidad contractual y/o extracontractual frente al referente y/o el referido y/o cualesquier tercero, lo que es aceptado incondicionalmente por cada referente. la empresa renuncia a cualquier tipo de responsabilidad por cualquier omisiÃ³n, inexactitud o error que pudiese sufrir esa plataforma con relaciÃ³n al programa de referidos.
referrals_tos.paragraph_8: La empresa podrÃ¡ modificar cualquiera de las clÃ¡usulas de estas bases en cualquier momento, sin previo aviso. El mismo hecho de participar en el programa de referidos implica el conocimiento y la aceptaciÃ³n plena de las bases y sus eventuales modificaciones, como asÃ­ tambiÃ©n los tÃ©rminos y condiciones generales del uso del sitio disponibles en /support/wallet-info/terms. Las decisiones de la empresa sobre todos y cada uno de los aspectos del programa de referidos, incluyendo decisiones por cualquier cuestiÃ³n no prevista en las bases, serÃ¡n definitivas e irrecurribles. La empresa se reserva el derecho de poner tÃ©rmino o modificar al programa de referidos en caso de existir fraudes, dificultades tÃ©cnicas o cualquier otro factor fuera de control de la empresa que pudiera comprometer la integridad del programa de referidos.
referrals_tos.paragraph_9: Como condiciÃ³n para participar en el programa, usted da su consentimiento para que la empresa obtenga y entregue su nombre, direcciÃ³n y otra informaciÃ³n a terceros con el fin de administrar este programa y cumplir con las leyes, regulaciones y reglas aplicables. cualquier informaciÃ³n que proporcione al patrocinador puede usarse para comunicarse con usted en relaciÃ³n con este programa. La informaciÃ³n enviada serÃ¡ tratada de acuerdo con la polÃ­tica de privacidad de la empresa.
referrals_tos.paragraph_10: Estas bases y el programa de referidos se gobiernan por las leyes de la repÃºblica argentina. cualquier controversia derivada del presente acuerdo, su existencia, validez, interpretaciÃ³n, alcance o cumplimiento, serÃ¡ sometida a los tribunales competentes con sede en la ciudad autÃ³noma de buenos aires.

disclaimer.agree_phrase_checkbox: I agree to XCAPIT's terms and conditions and privacy policy.
disclaimer.local_stored_keys_checkbox: I understand that my funds are kept safely within this device, and not by a company.

recovery_phrase_information.text2: The recovery phrase is the master key to your funds. Never share it with anybody.
recovery_phrase_information.text3: If you lose your recovery phrase, not even Xcapit will be able to recover your funds.

recovery_phrase_information_no_wallet.text3: As long as you have your 12 word phrase you will be able to recover your wallet and all your assets.

skip_backup_modal.description: I understand that if I do not make a copy of my recovery phrase, I may lose access to my funds.

recovery_phrase_info.title: Recovery phrase
recovery_phrase_info.description: It is a set of 12 ordered words, which serve as a master key to your funds.

info_phrase_advice_modal.title: Recovery phrase
info_phrase_advice_modal.description: It is a set of 12 ordered words, which serve as a master key to your funds.
info_phrase_advice_modal.item_1: Do not share it with anyone else, as anyone who has it will be able to access your funds.
info_phrase_advice_modal.item_2: Do not save your phrase in the cloud or on your mobile devices.
info_phrase_advice_modal.item_3: Do not share it via messaging services or social networks.
info_phrase_advice_modal.item_4: Keep it in a safe place.
info_phrase_advice_modal.item_5: You can engrave it on some element to make it last over time.

buy_conditions.title: What do you need to know before you buy?
buy_conditions.condition_1: Purchases are made through a third party provider. Xcapit does not sell cryptocurrencies.
buy_conditions.condition_2: The conditions of sale and delivery of tokens depend on each provider.
buy_conditions.condition_3: The provider may ask you for verification or KYC information. Xcapit does not (and will not) ask for personal or validation data.

select_provider.disclaimer: Remember that Xcapit does not sell cryptocurrencies, by clicking continue you will be redirected to an external provider.

kripton.description_2: Deliveries are made from Monday to Friday from 9:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. approximately.

moonpay.description_2: Depends on the external provider on a case-by-case basis.
moonpay.disclaimer: *Due to current restrictions, it is not possible to buy in Moonpay with cards issued in Argentina.

information_paxful.title: Buy BTC with Paxful:
information_paxful.subtitle: Paxful will allow you to buy only BTC. We will redirect you to their page to make the P2P purchase. Make sure you understand the following points before making a transaction:
information_paxful.recordatory_1: I understand that from this moment the operation will continue with the selected provider. Xcapit is not responsible for incorrect prices in the values ââor currencies defined hereinafter, nor for prejudices that may arise with the interaction with the provider.
information_paxful.recordatory_2: I understand that the seller sets their own BTC price based on speed, privacy, and convenience. Rates may vary depending on the method of payment.
information_paxful.recordatory_3: I understand that there will be a network fee to send the BTC to my Binance wallet. It is recommended to add to your purchase as max 0.0566USD to cover the network fee, otherwise the purchase will remain in your Paxful wallet.
information_paxful.recordatory_4: Remember that if you have active investments, your purchase will automatically be part of that investment.
information_paxful.modal_content: Please check the points to consider before making a purchase

operation_detail.disclaimer1: Remember that Xcapit does not sell cryptocurrencies, The entire purchase and adjudication flow is the responsibility of the operator.
operation_detail.disclaimer2: The delivery of tokens is made from Monday to Friday from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. and it may take longer if the bank delays in processing the transaction to the Krypton principal account.
operation_detail.support_text: If you have any questions contact

voucher_card.success: The voucher has been sent successfully

new_operation.thirdPartyKYC: I understand that KYC information is not requested or stored by Xcapit and that Krypton has a different data privacy policy than Xcapit.
new_operation.thirdPartyTransaction: I understand that by continuing to purchase I will be purchasing through a third party vendor (Kripton Market) subject to their own terms and conditions, for which Xcapit is not responsible.
new_operation.privacyPolicyAndTOS: I have read and accept the: Terms and Conditions and the Kripton Market Privacy Policy.

register.description: Complete the following form to register with our provider Kripton Market
register.description_bank: Complete your bank details with which you will operate with the provider
register.description_images: Upload the following images to finish the registration.

confirm.title: Check that the data is correct
confirm.disclaimer: Remember that Xcapit does not sell cryptocurrencies, the entire purchase and allocation flow is handled by the operator.
confirm.disclaimer2: The delivery of tokens is done from Monday to Friday from 9 am to 6 pm and may take some time if the bank delays in processing the transaction to Krypton's account.

paxful.text: Paxful will only let you buy BTC. We will redirect you to Paxful's page to complete the transaction.

kripton.disclaimer: Token delivery is made Monday through Friday from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. and may take some time if the bank delays in processing the transaction to Krypton's client account.

redirect_footer.text: By clicking âContinueâ, you will be redirected to the third-party vendor's site to complete your purchase ticket and pay for the transaction.

provider_new_operation_card.usd_disclaimer: *Enter the amount in dollars, at the end of the process you will pay in your local currency according to the quotation of the day.

kyc_disclaimer_modal.title: Krypton account registration
kyc_disclaimer_modal.description: You only have to create a Krypton account once, the next time you choose this operator you will be automatically logged in. Remember that the registration and purchase process is in the control of Krypton.

wealth_managements.title: What type of investor are you?
wealth_managements.subtitle: Take the investor profile test, or choose it manually and discover which investments might be right for you.

investor_test_options.description1: Know your investor profile by doing this test.
investor_test_options.description2: If you already know your investor profile, select it manually.

conservative_profile.title: Conservative Profile
conservative_profile.subtitle: You characterize yourself for being little risk-tolerant and valuing safety. Therefore, you prefer investment instruments that give you the certainty that you will not lose part or all of the money that you will invest. You do not care that the gains (performance) obtained are low.

moderated_profile.title: Moderate Profile
moderated_profile.subtitle: You are a cautious person with your decisions, but you are willing to tolerate a moderate risk to increase your profits. You try to maintain a balance between profitability and security.

aggressive_profile.title: Aggressive Profile
aggressive_profile.subtitle: You seek the highest possible returns, so you are willing to take whatever risk is necessary. It is not advisable to maintain this risk attitude when you do not have sufficient solvency, or if you have important family commitments.

no_wallet.title: You don't have your Xcapit wallet yet
